Take_care_vision_description.message: Configuring page display for easy reading, in order to maintain visual health, both for all sites and differentially for domains.

Attention_saving.message: Attention! When saving the changed default extension settings, previously made settings for individual domains will be reset to new default settings.

save_message.message:
Attention! 
Your individual settings, for specific domains, will be reset to the default new settings. 
You agree?

Initial_settings_message.message:
Attention! 
All extension settings will be reset to the initial settings. Your individual settings for certain domains will be reset to the new default settings. 
You agree?

Attention_initialize_extension.message:
Attention! 
To initialize the extension, you need to restart the current page.

Title_defaultButton.message: Reset to the settings set by the extension author and save the settings

Import_data_message.message:
Attention! 
When importing data from a file, all current extension settings will be replaced by imported settings. 
You agree?
